preprocessors.name: preprocessing-service-cleaner
preprocessors.description: a preprocessor that optimizes annotations, removing unused ones and reworking HTML code

preprocessors.name: preprocessing-service-dictionary
preprocessors.description: A preprocessor that uses a dictionary database to locate and annotate specific words, so they can be linked to their dictionary/terminology definitions

preprocessors.name: preprocessing-service-manual
preprocessors.description: A Preprocessor that searches for matching and existing preprocessed ePI, usually edited manually.

preprocessors.name: preprocessing-service-terminology
preprocessors.description: A preprocessor that identifies terms in the ICPC2 terminology, and annotates the whole sentence it appears in.

examples.name: preprocessing-service-example-python
examples.description: a preprocessor writen in Python with helper functions to explore HTMLElementLink extensions and HTML content of the ePI

examples.name: preprocessing-service-example-TypeScript
examples.description: A Template preprocessor written in TypeScript.
